articles.title: Readers' Choice: The Top Games of the '90s - an IGN Playlist by IGN Playlist Team - IGN
articles.description: In 2020, our readers cast 1.6 million votes to rank the best of the 1990s. Here are the first 100. Which ones have you finished? Log in and hit the [+] icons to track your completion status or build custom lists.

articles.title: 80 Days & Overboarding! - Official Trailer - IGN
articles.description: 80 Days & Overboard! combined in a boxed edition for Nintendo Switch - soon available for pre-order at selected retailers!
articles.content: 80 Days & Overboard! combined in a boxed edition for Nintendo Switch - soon available for pre-order at selected retailers!

articles.author: Kat Bailey
articles.title: Tony Sirico, Best-Known For Playing Sopranos' Paulie Walnuts, Dead At 79 - IGN
articles.description: Tony Sirico, who played Paulie Walnuts in The Sopranos along with a host of other gangster characters, has died at 79. Michael Imperioli paid tribute to his co-star on Instagram, calling him "loyal and big-hearted."
articles.content:
Tony Sirico, the actor best-known for playing Paulie Walnuts in The Sopranos, has died. He was 79.
Sopranos co-star Michael Imperioli confirmed the news in an Instagram post, saying, "I did a lot of… [+1670 chars]
